channel.title: About on Random HW Blog
channel.description: Recent content in About on Random HW Blog

item.description: Hi, I’m Nixon! I’m a research student from the UFRGS (Brazil) Passionate about digital hardware design on ASIC/FPGA I have some expereriences doing FPGA on constest and on undergraduate Currently I’m trying to becom an expert on UVM and SystemVerilog Here you could find some of my projects and what I’m currently learning Hope you like it!!! Have a look to my skills ;) Software Independent; Linux low level communication with hardware Hardware description Languages: VHDL, SystemVerilog.
